name: Elemental Resonance: Fervent Flames (In Effect)
description: During this round, the next instance of Pyro-Related Reactions the attached character triggers deals +3 DMG.
descriptionraw: During this round, the next instance of $[K213] the attached character triggers deals +3 DMG.
descriptionreplaced: During this round, the next instance of <color=#FF9999FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro-Related Reactions</color> the attached character triggers deals +3 DMG.
